title: Incredible Health CEO Says Diversity Drives Business Results
itunes:title: Incredible Health CEO Says Diversity Drives Business Results
description:
Dr. Iman Abuzeid, CEO at Incredible Health, discusses the importance of diversity in tech and healthcare. She explains that diversity isn’t just a moral and human rights issue and that it is also important for building better businesses.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
